dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, um, can you believe Kazakhstan is just, like, shutting down all their online government services? Isn't that, uh, a bit extreme?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, um, can you believe Kazakhstan is just, like, shutting down all their online government services? Isn't that, uh, a bit extreme?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Access to eGov portal and other government services will be restricted in Kazakhstan. According to JSC "National Information Technologies" (NIT), scheduled technical maintenance will be carried out to ensure the stable operation of the entire digital ecosystem of supported projects.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, "shutting down" is, uh, maybe a strong way to put it. It's more like scheduled technical maintenance.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, shutting down is, uh, maybe a strong way to put it. It's more like scheduled technical maintenance.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to JSC "National Information Technologies" (NIT), scheduled technical maintenance will be carried out to ensure the stable operation of the entire digital ecosystem of supported projects.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Maintenance? But for, like, everything? E-gov and all that stuff?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Maintenance? But for, like, everything? E-gov and all that stuff?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, the National Information Technologies company, NIT, they say it's for ensuring the stable operation of their entire digital ecosystem.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, the National Information Technologies company, N I T, they say it's for ensuring the stable operation of their entire digital ecosystem.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to JSC "National Information Technologies" (NIT), scheduled technical maintenance will be carried out to ensure the stable operation of the entire digital ecosystem of supported projects.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, but when is this happening? Like, is it right now? Uh, how long?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, but when is this happening? Like, is it right now? Uh, how long?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Good question. It's from 11 PM on March 20th, 2025, to 8 AM on March 21st, 2025.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Good question. It's from eleven P M on March twentieth, twenty twenty five, to eight A M on March twenty first, twenty twenty five.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The technical work is scheduled from 11:00 PM on March 20, 2025, to 8:00 AM on March 21, 2025.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Whoa, so that's, uh, overnight then. But what if you need something urgent, you know, during those hours?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Whoa, so that's, uh, overnight then. But what if you need something urgent, you know, during those hours?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: They chose that specific timeframe because it's when there's minimal user activity. The idea is to reduce potential inconvenience.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They chose that specific timeframe because it's when there's minimal user activity. The idea is to reduce potential inconvenience.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This timeframe was chosen to coincide with minimal user activity in order to reduce potential inconvenience," the statement reads.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Minimal user activity? But still, someone's gonna get caught out, right? Like, needing to, uh, access something important.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Minimal user activity? But still, someone's gonna get caught out, right? Like, needing to, uh, access something important.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That's why NIT, um, recommends completing all necessary operations in advance.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's why N I T, um, recommends completing all necessary operations in advance.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: To prevent potential inconvenience, JSC 'NIT' recommends completing all necessary operations in advance and preparing original documents if their presentation is required during the maintenance period,

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, so, like, plan ahead if you need to do something with the government?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, so, like, plan ahead if you need to do something with the government?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And, uh, if you need original documents for anything, have those ready if they're required during that window.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And, uh, if you need original documents for anything, have those ready if they're required during that window.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: JSC 'NIT' recommends completing all necessary operations in advance and preparing original documents if their presentation is required during the maintenance period," the statement clarified.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, like, back to paper? Wow.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, like, back to paper? Wow.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Temporarily, yes. Just for those, uh, nine hours of planned work.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Temporarily, yes. Just for those, uh, nine hours of planned work.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The technical work is scheduled from 11:00 PM on March 20, 2025, to 8:00 AM on March 21, 2025.
